page.title: 13Highland Farm
page.content: {Highland Farm} is owned and managed by my Dad, Mr D. Greasby. He has worked on his farm for ten years and has two farm workers beside himself. He gets up at 6.55am every morning. On the farm he grows barley,wheat, oilseed rape, potatoes, and grass. 1985 been an average year for crops. The farm has 230 acres of land. As well as crops he has got 1000 pigs and 70 beef cattle. To help with the work on the farm he has some machinary including a Molty handler, a combine harvester, a seedrill, mill and mix feeder, disc harrow, potato harvester, bailor, sprayer, pneumatic spreader, 4 tractors 4 trailors, 2 ploughs, and 2 cultivators. Last year crops were more successful than cattle. He enjoys working on the farm but at times it can be very hard work. (Kate Greasby)
